title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mac's Slump, Belichick Future with Tom Curran, Matt Mosley on Dak WFT Bounceback, Cowboys Playoff Matchups
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mac's Slump, Belichick Future with Tom Curran, Matt Mosley on Dak WFT Bounceback, Cowboys Playoff Matchups
description:
Colin points out the crazy similarities between Dak Prescott and Baker Mayfield, and the major difference between them (3:00). He also explains why the Giants and Jets are failing in comparison to the Rams and Chargers (9:00). Then, NBC Sports Boston’s Patriots insider Tom Curran joins Colin to discuss his reaction to the team’s loss to the Bills (14:00), if the Patriots coaching staff could be in for a big shakeup (22:00), and the expectations for the Patriots playoff chances (30:00). Next, Cowboys writer Matt Mosley joins Colin to discuss what looks different about Dak (37:00), the Cowboys’ toughest playoff matchup (42:00), and which college coach will have the most trouble at his new school (51:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
